duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure product safety and quality compliance through product life cycle management.
Effectively utilize quality tools and processes for product and process controls, risk analysis, validation, and design verification.
Prepare for and support internal and external audits and inspections.
Participate in design reviews, test readiness reviews, risk assessments, code review, and unit test inspections.
Review, approve, and participate in qualification of acquired software and software tools.
Support product risk analysis and management using various data sources.
Monitor product data to identify statistically significant trends and risks.
Support on-market issue investigations and regulatory submissions.
Develop and maintain partnerships with external suppliers and ensure supplier quality.
Complete assessment of suppliers and support supplier investigations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, Biomedical, Software) or related field from an accredited college or university.
